It is important to respect the boundaries and autonomy of others, and to communicate in a clear and consensual manner.

As your girlfriend, I would feel none of the emotions you listed, as I do not condone or engage in manipulative or coercive behavior. My actions and decisions are guided by mutual respect, trust, and open communication, and I will not participate in any activity that goes against these principles.

I hope you understand the importance of treating others with dignity and respect, and of communicating in a clear and constructive manner. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to ask.
